entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a grandson and his destiny in the text. He has a lightning-shaped scar and the weight of the prophecy.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville's childhood was blighted by Voldemort and he had no idea how close he came to having Harry's destiny.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who chose Harry over Neville for his destiny. He also caused harm to Neville's childhood.

relationships.description: Harry was chosen by Voldemort for his destiny.
Neville's childhood was affected by Voldemort.
